sentences.en: Can all these apparent indications of plate thickness really be mistaken?
sentences.cn: 所有这些关于板块厚度的明显标志有可能弄错 吗 ?

sentences.en: Even slight contamination could affect film thickness to a considerable degree.
sentences.cn: 即使存在一点污染物就会对液膜厚度产生一定程度的影响.

sentences.en: Exaggerated sections distort the shapes of folds as well as bed thickness.
sentences.cn: 比例放大的剖面歪曲褶皱的形态和岩层厚度.

sentences.en: Expose ends in partial - thickness burns when the crust desquamates and falls off.
sentences.cn: 在部分厚度烧伤,痂皮剥脱和脱掉后,暴露即告结束.

sentences.en: Gauges are used for finding out the exact thickness of a wire.
sentences.cn: 量规用来测量金属线的准确粗细.

sentences.en: Only certain small full - thickness burns lend themselves to initial excision.
sentences.cn: 只有某些小面积的全厚度烧伤才可施行初期切除.

sentences.en: Strain the mixture through a double thickness of muslin or cheesecloth.
sentences.cn: 用双层平纹细布或干酪包布过滤混合料。

sentences.en: The egg had a shell thickness of 0.14mm and the newly-hatched chick weighed nine grams.
sentences.cn: 那只蛋的壳厚0.14毫米，新孵出的雏鸟重9克。

sentences.en: The size of the fish will determine the thickness of the steaks.
sentences.cn: 鱼的大小决定鱼排的厚度。

sentences.en: The subsidiary channels have a thickness in the range 6 - 12 m.
sentences.cn: 次要河道砂岩体的厚度为 6-12 米.

sentences.en: The surrounding walls of amazing thickness kept off all sounds behind them.
sentences.cn: 四周的围墙厚得惊人,隔绝了所有的声音.

sentences.en: The thickness of the walls is 5 feet.
The timber is graded according to its thickness.
There is no pressure gradient through the thickness of the film.
sentences.cn: 贯穿流体膜厚度无压力梯度.

sentences.en: What softness and furry thickness of the tall pines about the shore!
sentences.cn: 两岸挺拔的松树多么柔和,多么浓密!

sentences.en: What's the thickness of the wall?

words.tran_cn: 最拥挤部份；活动最多部份；事物的粗大浓密部份
增厚；增稠剂，[食品] 芡粉；稠化
使变厚；变浓（thicken的现在分词）
变浓；变厚；变得模糊；变粗；变复杂
使变厚；使模糊；使…变复杂

phrases.tran_cn: 板块厚度；筛板厚度；金属板厚度
凝固壳厚度；管炮厚度；壳壁厚度

trans.tran_cn: 层，浓度，厚（度），最厚的部分
